sources.title: Beware of Ladies
sources.description: Title: Beware of Ladies Summary: A female reporter with marital problems is sent by her boss to cover the campaign of a young political neophyte who's running against the local crooked political boss. Directed by: Irving Pichel Actors: Donald Cook, Judith Allen, George Meeker Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 21 December 1936 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A female reporter with marital problems is sent by her boss to cover the campaign of a young political neophyte who's running against the local crooked political boss.

metadata.Plot: A female reporter with marital problems is sent by her boss to cover the campaign of a young political neophyte who's running against the local crooked political boss.
metadata.Actors: Donald Cook, Judith Allen, George Meeker
